word_mean_info__list.difference: 着重指通过努力使失去的东西复得。
指建筑物、工艺品恢复原状，也指健康、能力等的恢复。
主要指回收或利用废物。
普通用词，含义广，可泛指收回去的物质的或精神的东西，也指无意中找到失物。

bilingual.target: “地球人，你的孩子很快会恢复。”

bilingual.source: Music helped him recover from the shock of this terrible accident.
bilingual.target: 音乐帮助他从这次可怕的事故中恢复过来。

bilingual.source: This recovery system can help you recover deleted files.
bilingual.target: 这个恢复系统可以帮助你恢复被删除的文件。

bilingual.source: The doctor said he needs time to recover.
bilingual.target: 医生说他需要时间来恢复。

bilingual.source: You need bed rest to recover faster.
bilingual.target: 你需要卧床休息才能恢复得更快。

bilingual.source: Can you help me recover this system data?
bilingual.target: 你能帮我恢复这些系统数据吗？

bilingual.source: You need to rest sufficiently to recover.
bilingual.target: 你需要充分地休息才能恢复体力。

bilingual.source: We can help you recover your user account.
bilingual.target: 我们可以帮助你恢复你的用户账号。

bilingual.source: Many women recover quickly after a Cesarean.
bilingual.target: 许多女性在剖腹产后恢复得很快。

bilingual.source: The athlete struggles to recover from his injury.
bilingual.target: 运动员挣扎着从伤病中恢复。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I don't know, Sheldon. It's going to take me a while to recover from all the fun I had today.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不知道哦，谢尔顿，我要花一段时间才能从今天度过的乐趣中恢复过来。

yingyinNormal.en: I apologize. I wish you had more time to recover, but unfortunately, we don't have that luxury. Please, have a seat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 非常抱歉没能给你更多的时间去恢复，但是不幸的是，我们不能那么奢侈，请入座。

yingyinNormal.en: No, but I am hoping to recover some of its cognition. We managed to stabilize its wetware before there was too much decomposition. See?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不知道，但我希望能恢复它的一些认知功能，我们成功地在分解加剧之前，稳定了它的脑部，你看。

yingyinNormal.en: My father didn't just recover. He improved.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的父亲不仅痊愈了，他还进步了。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Rise of the Planet of the Apes》

yingyinNormal.en: In fact, it's been a bright spot as we keep fighting to recover from the great recession.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上，这一直是我们从大萧条中不断复苏过来的亮点。

yingyinNormal.en: And after every single person aboard your ship suffocates, I will walk over your cold corpses to recover my people.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等你们一个不剩的窒息而亡我会踩着你们冰冷的尸体，救出我的伙伴。

yingyinNormal.en: You're gonna be fine. Just do it. You'll have all of spring break to recover. Mr. Davenport, you're not listening. I'm not going on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你会好起来的。上台去演吧。 等你放春假，有的是时间休息。达文波特先生，你不理解我的意思，我不演了。

yingyinNormal.en: But to be clear, when you're making these decisions for me, give my heart at least 24 hours to recover before you cut me stem to stern.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是我先声明，如果你要替我做这些决定，在你决定把我从头到脚剖开之前，请先让我的心脏休息24小时。

yingyinNormal.en: Now upon arrival you will be taken in hand by our people so that we might recover our merchandise and you might rediscover the freedom, which you so richly deserve.
yingyinNormal.zh: 落地以后还会有我们的人护送，等我们拿到东西你们就会找回应得的自由。

yingyinNormal.en: An operation is currently underway to recover Margot Kim's Toyota Camry. But at this moment, we still don't know whether the Evercreek High sophomore is actually inside the vehicle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正在进行玛戈·金驾驶的丰田凯美瑞打捞工作。但目前，仍不清楚是否这位埃弗克里克高二学生在车中。

yingyinNormal.en: That is yours to circulate. But focusing on the events of this morning, The Silicon Valley Police Department was able to recover Ms. Kim's vehicle. And to answer the most pressing question, Margot Kim was not inside.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是你们都知道的。重点在今天早上发生的事情，硅谷的警察局打捞上了金女士的车。回答目前最急切的问题玛戈·金不在车里。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: This teaches them how to handle and <highlight>recover</highlight> from disappointment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这教会他们如何处理失望并从失望中恢复过来。

examination_example.sentence: According to the International Business Times, electric car sales are expected to increase as Volkswagen is still <highlight>recovering</highlight> from its emissions scandal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据《国际商业时报》(International Business Times)的报道，由于大众汽车(Volkswagen)仍在从尾气排放的丑闻中恢复元气，因此电动汽车的销售有望增长。

sense_info_list.en: return to a normal state of health, mind, or strength
remove or extract an energy source or industrial chemical for use, reuse, or waste treatment

examination_example.sentence: Electronic products contain valuable metals that could be <highlight>recovered</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电子产品中含有可回收利用的贵重金属。

sense_info_list.en: find or regain possession of something stolen or lost

examination_example.sentence: 99% of the duties, taxes or fees paid on the merchandise may be <highlight>recovered</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 99% 商品所支付的关税、税款或费用可能会被追回。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: find or regain possession of something stolen or lost

examination_example.sentence: According to the official news agency, Russian authorities have <highlight>recovered</highlight> more than 170 gold bars weighing 20 kilograms each.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据官方新闻机构报道，俄罗斯当局已追回170多根金条，每根重达20公斤。

examination_example.sentence: What did the waitress do about the <highlight>recovered</highlight> ring?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 服务员对找回的戒指做了什么?

examination_example.sentence: Finally, the FBI received a tip that the stolen document was located very close to Washington, D. C. Their art crime team <highlight>recovered</highlight> the letter but were unable to press charges because the time of limitations had ended.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，联邦调查局(FBI)收到线索，被盗文件的位置离华盛顿特区非常近。他们的艺术犯罪小组找回了这封信，但由于诉讼时效已经结束，无法提出指控。

sense_info_list.en: return to a normal state of health; mind; or strength

examination_example.sentence: The simple procedure went smoothly and the woman has <highlight>recovered</highlight> fully.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 简单的手术进展顺利，这名妇女已经完全康复。

sense_info_list.en: remove or extract an energy source or industrial chemical for use; reuse; or waste treatment

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: But she <highlight>recovered</highlight>, though slowly, and was ready for discharge (出院) after four weeks.

examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们有一位女性病人，她刚做完膝关节置换手术，正在康复中。

examination_example.sentence: Hospital patients who see tree branches out their window are likely to <highlight>recover</highlight> at a faster rate than patients who see buildings instead.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
